content: **knitted vest with v-neck in drops snow size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ee-704 yarn group e or c + c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 400-450-450-500-550-600 g colour 66 sea green or use drops wish from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 300-350-350-400-400-450 g colour 14 sea green **knitting gauge** 11 stitches in width and 15 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 8 mm length 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 7 mm length 40 and 80 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size drops buttons marble nr 630 3-3-3-4-4-4 pieces
